mapper.select:
SELECT p.placeName , CONCAT(p.largeAddress , ' ', p.midiumAddress) AS address, COUNT(pf.userId) as userFavorite, ps.highestBadge , ps.secondHighestBadge , ps.iScore , ps.review AS reviewCnt, ps.placeVerified, (COALESCE(p2.cumulativePoint, 0) div 1000) + 1 AS `level`, COALESCE(u.nickName, '아이고조아') AS nickName, COALESCE(br.review, '베스트 리뷰가 없습니다.') AS review , COALESCE(br.modifiedAt, '2024-01-01 00:00:00') AS modifiedAt, COALESCE(br.likeCount, 0) AS likeCount, pi2.firstUrl , pi2.secondUrl , pi2.thirdUrl FROM places p LEFT JOIN placesFavorite pf ON pf.placeName = p.placeName AND pf.userId = '${userId}' LEFT JOIN placesStats ps ON ps.placeName = p.placeName LEFT JOIN bestReviews br ON br.placeName = p.placeName LEFT JOIN users u ON br.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN placeImages pi2 ON pi2.placeName = p.placeName LEFT JOIN points p2 ON br.userId = p2.userId WHERE
p.largeAddress = '${addressCategory}' and
UPPER(TRIM(REPLACE(p.placeName, ' ', ''))) LIKE UPPER('%${searchKeyword}%') GROUP BY p.placeName
ORDER BY ps.iScore ASC, userFavorite DESC , ps.placeVerified DESC
ORDER BY ps.iScore DESC, userFavorite DESC , ps.placeVerified DESC
ORDER BY ps.placeVerified DESC, userFavorite DESC, ps.iScore ASC
ORDER BY ps.placeVerified ASC, userFavorite DESC, ps.iScore DESC
ORDER BY userFavorite ASC, ps.iScore DESC , ps.placeVerified DESC
ORDER BY userFavorite DESC, ps.iScore DESC , ps.placeVerified DESC
ORDER BY reviewCnt DESC, userFavorite ASC, ps.iScore DESC
ORDER BY reviewCnt ASC, userFavorite ASC, ps.iScore DESC
LIMIT ${startRowValue} , ${rowCnt}
SELECT placeName, placeLatitude, placeLongitude FROM places
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM placesFavorite WHERE placeName = '${placeName}' AND userId = '${userId}'
mapper.select: SELECT p.placeName , pi2.firstUrl, pi2.secondUrl, pi2.thirdUrl, CONCAT(p.largeAddress , ' ', p.midiumAddress, ' ', p.smallAddress) AS address, p.placeDescription , p.placeLatitude , p.placeLongitude , p.operatingHours, ps.parkingAvailable AS totalParkingAvailable , ps.`view` AS totalView , ps.nightView AS totalNightView , ps.freeEntry AS totalFreeEntry , ps.easyTransport AS totalEasyTransport , ps.iScore AS avgIScore, COALESCE(r.review, "") AS review, COALESCE(r.parkingAvailable, 0) AS parkingAvailable, COALESCE(r.`view`, 0) AS `view`, COALESCE(r.nightView, 0) AS nightView, COALESCE(r.freeEntry, 0) AS freeEntry, COALESCE(r.easyTransport, 0) AS easyTransport, COALESCE(r.iScore, 2) AS iScore, COALESCE(pf.userFavorite, 0) AS userFavorite FROM places p LEFT JOIN placesStats ps ON ps.placeName = p.placeName LEFT JOIN placeImages pi2 ON pi2.placeName = p.placeName LEFT JOIN reviews r ON r.placeName = p.placeName AND r.userId = '${ userId }' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pf.placeName , COUNT(*) AS userFavorite FROM placesFavorite pf WHERE pf.placeName = '${ placeName }' AND userId = '${ userId }') pf ON pf.placeName = p.placeName WHERE p.placeName = '${ placeName }'
SELECT ps.placeName, pi.firstUrl FROM placesStats ps LEFT JOIN placeImages pi ON pi.placeName = ps.placeName ORDER BY ps.placeVerified DESC, ps.placeFavorite DESC LIMIT 8

select placeName from places p
placeName rlike '^(ㄱ)' or (placeName >= '가' and placeName < '나')
placeName rlike '^(ㄴ)' or (placeName >= '나' and placeName < '다')
placeName rlike '^(ㄷ)' or (placeName >= '다' and placeName < '라')
placeName rlike '^(ㄹ)' or (placeName >= '라' and placeName < '마')
placeName rlike '^(ㅁ)' or (placeName >= '마' and placeName < '바')
placeName rlike '^(ㅂ)' or (placeName >= '바' and placeName < '사')
placeName rlike '^(ㅅ)' or (placeName >= '사' and placeName < '아')
placeName rlike '^(ㅇ)' or (placeName >= '아' and placeName < '자')
placeName rlike '^(ㅈ)' or (placeName >= '자' and placeName < '차')
placeName rlike '^(ㅊ)' or (placeName >= '차' and placeName < '카')
placeName rlike '^(ㅋ)' or (placeName >= '카' and placeName < '타')
placeName rlike '^(ㅌ)' or (placeName >= '타' and placeName < '파')
placeName rlike '^(ㅍ)' or (placeName >= '파' and placeName < '하')
placeName RLIKE '^(ㅎ)' or (placeName >= '하' and placeName <= '힣')
UPPER(TRIM(REPLACE(placeName, ' ', ''))) LIKE UPPER('${searchKeyword}%')
AND largeAddress = '${addressCategory}'
order by placeName
